original_text: And when all the land of Egypt was famished, the people cried to Pharaoh for bread: and Pharaoh said unto all the Egyptians, Go unto Joseph; what he saith to you, do.
korean_text: 애굽 온 땅이 굶주리매 백성이 바로에게 부르짖어 양식을 구하는지라 바로가 애굽 모든 백성에게 이르되 요셉에게 가서 그가 너희에게 이르는 대로 하라 하니라

sentences.original_text: And when all the land of Egypt was famished
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 애굽 온 땅이 굶주렸을 때에

sentences.original_text: the people cried to Pharaoh for bread
and Pharaoh said unto all the Egyptians
what he saith to you, do
